channel.title: Recommendation
channel.description:
Since I'm quite new to Java and I can't yet code on my own with out ruining my server, I'd like to recommend an idea to stop SYIPkers: If it's possible in Java you could have the server automatically ipban a player who says the same thing (or something close to it) more than 5 times in 5 seconds. Please comment for other ideas or possible backfires. ;)
Also, is there any topics on any other mopar-related site about coding for mopar? (So I can code on my own) Or do I have to look at the entire java guide itself?

item.title: Recommendation
item.dc:creator: @derive derive
item.description:
@derive wrote:

that might just work.

Read full topic
